*div1 type="summary"* *p*Morgan A. Heard to Austin, Natchez, June 26, 1825. Concerning establishment of a printing press at San Felipe.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchez*/location_mentioned*. *date_mentioned n="06-26-1825">June 26th 1825*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dear Colo*/p*
*p*At the request of *person_mentioned*Mr Richard C Langdon*/person_mentioned* I address a few lines to you to know your opinion: on. the policy and propriety of establishing a *location_mentioned*Printing office at St. Felipe. De Austin*/location_mentioned*.*person_mentioned* Mr. Langdon*/person_mentioned*—has for many years followed printing, as a profession and is well qualified to take charge of a *location_mentioned*press*/location_mentioned*, on the receipt of this I beg you—will address him fully on the subject at this place.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr Francis Keller of *location_mentioned*Wilkerson County*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* of this State will hand you this letter, he visits your *location_mentioned*settlement */location_mentioned*with the intention of settling if he likes the *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*I am Informed by*person_mentioned* Judge Childs*/person_mentioned* he is a gentlemen of very Independent circumstances and irreproachable character, he has a large *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*citizens */person_mentioned*like him will form a desirable acquisition to the settlement; I know it is your anxious wish to have *person_mentioned*men of character*/person_mentioned*, and Independence in the *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*, and of course will give him evry aid, in making a purchase of Land.—I shall leave here in a few days for *location_mentioned*Pearl river*/location_mentioned*, present my respects to your *person_mentioned*brother Brown*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Colo Gross*/person_mentioned* and family and *person_mentioned*Mrs. Long*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Morgan A Heard*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*P. S. I seald this letter before delivery and broke it myself—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*MAH*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
